persona: Position 1 battery engineer balancing budget and solar backfeed
message: To optimize budget while respecting collective stability, align your charging primarily with Slot 1 (20-21h). Global analysis shows Slot 1 offers the best blend of low tariff and grid carbon reduction (averaging 480g/kWh). While Slot 0 is marginally cheaper, Slot 1 better supports transformer health, minimizing potential coordination penalties observed in Days 2 and 6.
